mapper.insert: insert into word_recited (USERNAME, WORD_NAME, REPEATS, LAST_RECITE) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wordName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repeats,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastRecite,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select USERNAME, WORD_NAME, REPEATS, LAST_RECITE from word_recited
mapper.insert: replace into word_recited (USERNAME, WORD_NAME, REPEATS, LAST_RECITE) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wordName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repeats,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastRecite,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select count(*) from word_recited where USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
